name: Space Race (Channel F)
description:
First Released:  Wednesday 22nd 2023

One or Two Player game, Simultaneous 

A port of the 1973 arcade game Space Race, Weave past the stars as they fly past during your journey from the bottom of the screen to the top. Reaching the top scores a point, time limit represented by the line in the middle counts down until the round ends.

Plunging down the controller moves you forward (up),  Pulling up on the controller moves you backward (down).

Instruction booklet included for additional help and giggles.
